com.squareup.picasso3

Class Picasso.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.picasso3.Picasso.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Picasso

    public static class Picasso.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Fluent API for creating Picasso instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(android.content.Context context)
      Start building a new Picasso instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Picasso.Builder addRequestHandler(RequestHandler requestHandler)
      Register a RequestHandler.
      Picasso.Builder addRequestTransformer(Picasso.RequestTransformer transformer)
      Add a transformer that observes and potentially modify all incoming requests.
      Picasso build()
      Create the Picasso instance.
      Picasso.Builder callFactory(Call.Factory factory)
      Specify the call factory to be used for network requests.
      Picasso.Builder client(OkHttpClient client)
      Specify the HTTP client to be used for network requests.
      Picasso.Builder defaultBitmapConfig(android.graphics.Bitmap.Config bitmapConfig)
      Specify the default Bitmap.Config used when decoding images.
      Picasso.Builder executor(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService)
      Specify the executor service for loading images in the background.
      Picasso.Builder indicatorsEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Toggle whether to display debug indicators on images.
      Picasso.Builder listener(Picasso.Listener listener)
      Specify a listener for interesting events.
      Picasso.Builder loggingEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Toggle whether debug logging is enabled.
      Picasso.Builder withCacheSize(int maxByteCount)
      Specify the memory cache size in bytes to use for the most recent images.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder(android.content.Context context)
        Start building a new Picasso instance.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultBitmapConfig

        public Picasso.Builder defaultBitmapConfig(android.graphics.Bitmap.Config bitmapConfig)
        Specify the default Bitmap.Config used when decoding images. This can be overridden on a per-request basis using config(..).

      • client

        public Picasso.Builder client(OkHttpClient client)
        Specify the HTTP client to be used for network requests.

        Note: Calling callFactory overwrites this value.

      • callFactory

        public Picasso.Builder callFactory(Call.Factory factory)
        Specify the call factory to be used for network requests.

        Note: Calling client(OkHttpClient) overwrites this value.

      • executor

        public Picasso.Builder executor(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService)
        Specify the executor service for loading images in the background.

        Note: Calling shutdown() will not shutdown supplied executors.

      • withCacheSize

        public Picasso.Builder withCacheSize(int maxByteCount)
        Specify the memory cache size in bytes to use for the most recent images. A size of 0 disables in-memory caching.

      • listener

        public Picasso.Builder listener(Picasso.Listener listener)
        Specify a listener for interesting events.

      • addRequestTransformer

        public Picasso.Builder addRequestTransformer(Picasso.RequestTransformer transformer)
        Add a transformer that observes and potentially modify all incoming requests.

      • addRequestHandler

        public Picasso.Builder addRequestHandler(RequestHandler requestHandler)
        Register a RequestHandler.

      • indicatorsEnabled

        public Picasso.Builder indicatorsEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Toggle whether to display debug indicators on images.

      • loggingEnabled

        public Picasso.Builder loggingEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Toggle whether debug logging is enabled.

        WARNING: Enabling this will result in excessive object allocation. This should be only be used for debugging purposes. Do NOT pass BuildConfig.DEBUG.

      • build

        public Picasso build()
        Create the Picasso instance.
